ygData.subject: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: I was curious what has changed about the languages.  I used to be able to teach a language to my group and get better at it.  This is no longer so, and I
ygData.messageBody:
I was curious what has changed about the languages. I used to be able to teach a language to my group and get better at it. This is no longer so, and I talked to a GM who told me this was never so. I was also told that something changed in respect to languages and zoning or something. I am quite curious about this, as I am trying to learn every language I can. I was also curious if you could teach over your own knowledge in the language. Thank you in advance for your replies.
Adimisha Elvintide
Rodcet Nife server
